info.name: DISCONTINUED Light TweetDeck 3 Fire
info.description: I am officially discontinuing all my TweetDeck themes, so they may be outdated, but feel free to fork them (they now are into the public domain)! This style needs to be used with the light theme of TweetDeck, otherwise it will be ugly ! This style is a new version of this one with a new design and new functionalities like a trending topics column at the right of the columns or new webkit scrollbars.
info.additionalInfo: Light TweetDeck family : Light TweetDeck Classic Aero•Aqua Light TweetDeck 2.1 Aero•Aqua•Night•Purple•Laïss•Candy•Fire•Coco Light TweetDeck 3 Aero•Aqua•Night•Purple•Laïss•Candy•Fire•Coco Newspaper Light•Dark
